{
                        "email": "nilesh@gmail.com",
                        "password": "abc123",
                        "userName": "nilesh",

						"lastname":"chavan",
						"interest":"programming",
						"aos":"C"
}
***login***
{
                       
                        "password": "abc123",
                        "userName": "nilesh"
						
}
****addquestions****(user can add questions and tags will be generated by the model)
{
	"question":"what is bootstrap?",
	 "comunity": "vcet"
}
****addanswers****(user can add answer to the questions)
{
	"qid":"5c9745f5be3e0a5b45ad1056",
	"answer":"visit w3school wbsite"
}
****accept****(user can accept the someone's answer to his/her question if the answer worked for him/her)
{
	"aid":"5c974738be3e0a5b45ad1059",
	"flag":"1"


}
****acceptreq****(the admin of community will decide wheter to accept or reject)
{
"rid":"5c974d134177c741b588140d",
"status":"1"

}

****createcommunity****(user can create a community ie a group)
{
"name":"vcet",
"open":"true"
}
****deleteanswer****(user can delete his/her own answwer)
{
	"aid":"5c7bc2aae6ad7199628f7c5c"

}
****deleteansweradmin****(admin can delete spam answers)
{
	"aid":"5c7bc2aae6ad7199628f7c5c"

}
****deletequestion****(user can delete his/her own question)
{
	"qid":"5c7bb191400d878a561e147e"

}
****editanswer****(can edit own answer)
{
	"aid":"5c974755be3e0a5b45ad105a",
	"answer":"java is old "
}
****editdownvotes****(answer)
{
	"aid":"5c974738be3e0a5b45ad1059",
	"flag":"1"

}
****editupvotes****(answer)
{
	"aid":"5c974738be3e0a5b45ad1059",
	"flag":"1"

}
****editdownvotesquestion****
{
	"qid":"5c9745c9be3e0a5b45ad1055",
	"flag":"1"
}
****editupvotesquestion****
{
	"qid":"5c9745c9be3e0a5b45ad1055",
	"flag":"1"
}
****follow****(if group is open then user is added to members list else request is send to admin tof group)
{
"cid":"5c974bf92df65846e571c9e3"

}
****removemember****(admin of group can remove a member from group)
{
"cid":"5c7bef09c99959b452116ca2",
"name":"nilesh"

}

****verifyanswer****(admin can verify the answers)
{
	"aid":"5c7bc2aae6ad7199628f7c5c"

}

****viewqa****(view a question and all its answers)
{
	"qid":"5c9745c9be3e0a5b45ad1055"

}
****viewquestionbytag****(view all questions of a tag)
{
	"tag":"given by the ml model"
}
